ontime.config.allow_players_silent.toolt: If enabled, all players can use /timer silent. If disabled, only operators can use it
ontime.command.reset.noactive: §cNo active timer to reset. Use §f/timer reset <name> §cto reset a specific timer
ontime.command.error.maxtime.add: §cAdding this time would exceed maximum allowed time of §f%s
ontime.config.title: OnTime Configuration
ontime.config.timer_x.tooltip: X position of the timer (-1 for centered)
ontime.config.timer_y.tooltip: Y position of the timer from the top
ontime.config.color_high.tooltip: Color when timer is above mid threshold
ontime.config.color_mid.tooltip: Color when timer is between thresholds
ontime.config.color_low.tooltip: Color when timer is below low threshold
ontime.config.permission_level.tooltip: Required permission level for timer commands
ontime.config.max_timer_seconds.tooltip: Maximum allowed timer duration in seconds
ontime.config.allow_players_hide.tooltip: If enabled, all players can use /timer hide. If disabled, only operators can use it
ontime.config.allow_players_list.tooltip: If enabled, all players can use /timer list. If disabled, only operators can use it
ontime.config.position_preset.tooltip: Select a preset position for the timer. Choose 'Custom' to use manual X/Y coordinates
ontime.config.timer_x.disabled: X coordinate is controlled by the selected preset. Change to 'Custom' to edit manually
ontime.config.timer_y.disabled: Y coordinate is controlled by the selected preset. Change to 'Custom' to edit manually
ontime.config.allow_players_position.too: If enabled, all players can use /timer position. If disabled, only operators can change timer position
ontime.command.position.invalid: §cInvalid preset: §f%s§c. Use tab completion to see available presets
ontime.command.validation.no_slash: §cDo not include '/' at the beginning of the command
ontime.command.validation.invalid_charac: §cCommand name contains invalid characters. Use only letters, numbers, '_' and '-'
ontime.help.footer: Tip: Click on any command for more details with /timer help <command>
ontime.help.command_not_found: §cCommand '%s' not found. Use /timer help to see all commands
ontime.help.create.desc: Create a new timer with optional command
ontime.help.stop.desc: Stop and reset the active timer
ontime.help.reset.desc: Reset a timer to default value
ontime.help.set.desc: Set timer to a specific time
ontime.help.silent.desc: Toggle timer sound for yourself or specified players
ontime.help.list.desc: List all timers and their status
